title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Megyn Kelly joins Clay and Buck to talk about her new show on SiriusXM. Megyn and the guys take on the woke crowd getting their comeuppance. The discussion included topics such as free speech, corporatism, CRT being taught in schools, rising crime in blue cities and how we can fight back. Classic Wisdom from El Rushbo on ESPN's politicization of sports. 98-year-old World War II vet plays National Anthem on harmonica.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
